heading: About Me
text: Learn more about my profesional background as a software engineer and my values surronding work and technology

heading: Elden Ring Search UI
text: A search UI project based on using the Elden Ring API as a data source.  An example of using an API to gather, sort, and filter data

heading: ToddlerToDo
text: A sample project showcasing a TODO application designed for toddlers. The aim is to offer a colorful and engaging user interface that helps toddlers stay on track with their routines. Every parent knows the challenges of maintaining consistent wake-up and bedtime routines!
alt: sunrising over mountains with stars in the sky

heading: JobBattler
text: An attempt at creating a turn based job tracking movitivational game.  Adding jobs applied, recruiters talked to, and professional devleopment hours will increase your health, mana, and inellegience.  Alowing you to battle your foe - unemployment

heading: Video Game List Challenge
text: Based on a disagreement between friends surronding a Rolling Stones article.  A challenge was cast to create two lists by a friend. One list being my personal list of all time greatest games. Another list of the most important games to the world.
